title: Escalator - means a power-driven, inclined, continuous stairway used for ascending or descending between floors or bridge over a road / railway line
clause_text: Escalator - means a power-driven, inclined, continuous stairway used for ascending or descending between floors or bridge over a road / railway line.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
